synopsis.text:
In a bleak and desolate future, the once thriving Earth lies in ruins, a victim of a catastrophic event known as the Ruin. Amidst the decay, Casshern, a cybernetic assassin with no recollection of his past, emerges as the last hope for a dying world. Once a powerful warrior, Casshern is blamed for the assassination of Luna, a mysterious girl believed to be humanity's last hope. This heinous act triggered a chain reaction, leading to the downfall of both humans and robots.

Hundreds of years later, the world is a toxic wasteland, with humans on the brink of extinction and robots struggling to survive. The robots, once indestructible, now face the harsh reality of mortality as their mechanical bodies succumb to rust and decay. Desperate for salvation, they seek out Casshern, believing that consuming him will grant them immortality.

Haunted by fragmented memories and hunted by those he once fought alongside, Casshern embarks on a perilous journey to uncover his true identity and the role he played in the world's destruction. As he navigates through the remnants of a world that fears and despises him, Casshern must confront his past and unravel the truth behind his existence. Will he find redemption, or will he be forever cursed as the harbinger of the world's end? Only time will tell in this gripping reboot of the Casshern franchise.
